title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.214 - Permanent financial occupancy date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.214 - Permanent financial occupancy date

State Regulations

The date declared by the Commissioner of Health or his
designee after a facility has been occupied for a period of time. This date is
a financial concept date; it is not the date a facility admits its first
patient. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.214

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
